attributes.action: Make propaganda on the British public illegal
attributes.additional_details:
Propaganda on the public mind is making people who are aware of its use mentally and emotionally unstable.

Propaganda is the regimenting of the public mind like an army regiments its soldiers.

It is the manipulation of the masses into making a choice against their will.

It is therefore requested that the government discuss making propaganda on the British public made illegal before someone gets hurt either through suicide or retaliation.
